Class TakeResources

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TakeResources()
    Constructor of TakeResources sets the GameBoard of the current Player.

  • Constructor Details

    • TakeResources

      public TakeResources()
      Constructor of TakeResources sets the GameBoard of the current Player.

  • Method Details

    • getPurchased

      public Resource[] getPurchased()
      Method getPurchased returns the array of purchased resources.
      Returns:
      the array of purchased resources.

    • setPurchased

      public void setPurchased​(Resource[] purchased)
      Method setPurchased sets the array of purchased resources.
      Parameters:
      purchased - is the array of resources to set as purchased.

    • buyFromMarket

      public void buyFromMarket​(int number, java.lang.String line)
      Method selectLine takes the row or the column of the Market chosen by the Player and sets attribute purchased.
      Parameters:
      number - is the number of the line chosen by the Player
      line - is the row or the column chosen by the Player

    • checksOnMarbles

      public void checksOnMarbles() throws UndefinedLeaderCardAbilityException
      Method checksOnMarbles does some checks on the purchased marbles. If a marble is red, moves the Player's Faith Marker by one space on the Faith Track. If a marble is white, and the Player has only one Leader Card ability that converts a blank marble into a resource, each marble is converted.
      Throws:
      UndefinedLeaderCardAbilityException - when the Player has two Leader Card ability that converts a blank marble into a resource

    • convertBlankWhenTwoLeaders

      public void convertBlankWhenTwoLeaders​(int[] choice)
      Method convertBlankWhenTwoLeaders converts each white marble as indicated by the Player.
      Parameters:
      choice - is a array of integers which indicates the choice of the Player of which Leader Card to use for each white marble.

    • checkDiscardedResource

      public java.lang.String checkDiscardedResource​(Resource[] choice) throws IllegalInputException
      Method checkDiscardedResource checks if the Player has discarded some Resources bought from the Market, if so, the other Players receive a Faith Point for each Resource discarded.
      Parameters:
      choice - sorted array of Resources inserted by the client in input.
      Returns:
      the string with the discarded resources.
      Throws:
      IllegalInputException - if the input doesn't respect the rules of the stores.

    • addToStores

      public void addToStores​(Resource[] newWarehouse, Resource[] newLeaderDepot) throws IllegalInputException
      Method addToStores adds the purchased Resources to the stores as indicated by the Player.
      Parameters:
      newWarehouse - is a Resource array that represent the arranged warehouse (after the purchase).
      newLeaderDepot - is a Resource array that represent the arranged Leader Card depot (after the purchase). If there are no depots added with a Leader Card ability, this param is null.
      Throws:
      IllegalInputException
